alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 13 at 3:34AM CDT until April 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 012, 024, 038, AND 039... The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 012, 024, 038, and 039. * WIND...South to southwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts of 30 to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...Relative humidity in the 20 to 25 percent range. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
